column2: the parking is terrible.  They dont even have designated parking
column3: which sucks.  How is anyone supposed to get there.  we had to park in front of some random ladies house.  on the other hand
column4: the food was really good.  on the other other hand
column5: the space is really small and congested.  I like to have some elbow room when i stuff my face
column6: knaww mean?  its a good brunch joint basically.  on the other other other hand tho
column7: dont come here if your claustrophobic or homophobic
column8: because there are a lot of gay and proud LGB decor everywhere.  it is montrose after all
